DeviceMotionEvent.summary: The DeviceMotionEvent interface of the {{domxref("Device Orientation Events", "", "", "nocode")}} provides web developers with information about the speed of changes for the device's position and orientation.

blockquote.para: Currently, Firefox and Chrome do not handle the coordinates the same way. Take care about this while using them.
